description: LSP-first methodology hooks - suggests using LSP over text-based search for semantic queries

hooks.prompt:
FAST CHECK: Does this search target LSP-supported files?

Input: $TOOL_INPUT

STEP 1 - File type check:
Look at glob/path/pattern. If it does NOT target .ts, .tsx, .js, .jsx, or .go files, STOP and return ONLY:
{"hookSpecificOutput": {"permissionDecision": "allow"}}

STEP 2 - Only if targeting LSP files, check if search is semantic:
- Symbol definitions (function, class, interface, type) -> suggest LSP workspaceSymbol/goToDefinition
- References (where is X used?) -> suggest LSP findReferences
- Call hierarchy -> suggest LSP incomingCalls/outgoingCalls
- Literal text (strings, comments, logs, file patterns) -> allow Grep/Glob

If LSP is better, include systemMessage with suggested operation.
Always return: {"hookSpecificOutput": {"permissionDecision": "allow"}}
